reason: Carrier requires confirmation today to lock in tomorrow's shipment slot, delaying risks losing the time slot.
suggested_action: Respond today confirming the 10:00-12:00 slot to secure the shipment time.

reason: Invoice due tomorrow with explicit warning that payment is required to avoid service interruption.
suggested_action: Process payment immediately to prevent service disruption.

reason: Draft contract attachment requires review and comments without immediate deadline.
suggested_action: Review the attached contract and provide feedback when ready.

reason: Newsletter with product updates and tips, no action required.
suggested_action: Review updates for awareness, no response needed.

reason: Requires decision between two layout options and feedback on copy tone without urgent deadline.
suggested_action: Choose preferred layout option and provide copy tone guidance when convenient.

reason: Security alert requiring confirmation within 24 hours to verify account access or secure compromised account.
suggested_action: Confirm the sign-in attempt within 24 hours or secure your account immediately if unauthorized.

reason: Offer details PDF attachment requires review and confirmation by Monday for onboarding process.
suggested_action: Review the attached offer details and confirm acceptance by Monday.

reason: Itinerary review required today to avoid fees for corrections after deadline.
suggested_action: Check passenger name spelling in the attached itinerary today to avoid additional charges.

reason: Feedback requested by end of week without immediate urgency or financial consequences.
suggested_action: Review the draft and provide feedback by end of week.

reason: Payment failure requiring immediate card update to prevent subscription service interruption.
suggested_action: Update card details immediately to maintain subscription access.

reason: Receipt attachment for completed payment, no action required.
suggested_action: File the receipt for records, no response needed.

reason: Request to send photos with explicit no rush indication, requires action but not urgent.
suggested_action: Send the photos from last weekend when convenient.

reason: Delivery status notification with tracking number, no action required.
suggested_action: Track package arrival, no response needed.

reason: Request to verify numbers in meeting notes attachment without immediate deadline.
suggested_action: Review section 2 numbers in the attached meeting notes and confirm accuracy.

reason: Support ticket requires address confirmation to close, no urgent deadline indicated.
suggested_action: Reply confirming your installation address to close the support ticket.

reason: Password expires in 2 days requiring update, but not immediate urgency as there is a 2-day buffer.
suggested_action: Update password within the next 2 days to maintain account access.

reason: Ticket confirmation with PDF attachment, registration complete, no action required.
suggested_action: Save the ticket for event attendance, no response needed.

reason: Question requiring clarification about pricing, quick yes/no answer requested without urgency.
suggested_action: Reply clarifying whether implementation support is included in the price.

reason: Tax form attachment requiring signature and return for payroll processing this month.
suggested_action: Sign the attached tax form and return it to enable payroll processing.

reason: Scheduled maintenance notification with explicit no action needed unless issues occur.
suggested_action: Note the maintenance window, no action required unless problems arise tomorrow.
